rooms.description: An expansive space with a North-facing entrance, integrating Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and bold lines. The living room features ample natural light from the north side, large windows, and modern Art Deco furniture to complement the farmhouse aesthetic.

A spacious bedroom with built-in storage and a private balcony facing North. Designed in an Art Deco style with geometric accents, rich textures, and modern amenities while ensuring a Vastu-aligned layout.
A comfortable bedroom for guests with Vastu principles in mind, including proper ventilation and natural light. Features Art Deco decorative elements and space-saving design.

A bright and airy room designed for children with safety features such as rounded corners and secure storage. Incorporates playful Art Deco motifs that are child-friendly while maintaining a farmhouse feel.
An adaptable space suitable for work or study, designed with adequate lighting from the north side and integrated Art Deco aesthetics. The layout is Vastu compliant to enhance focus and creativity.
An elegant dining area with a large table and seating for guests, featuring decorative elements from the Art Deco era, while ensuring that the placement complies with Vastu principles for prosperity.
A modern farmhouse kitchen with efficient layout and ample counter space. Designed following Vastu norms to ensure proper alignment with the flow of energy, incorporating Art Deco design accents.

openings.description: A grand entrance door aligned with the North. This opening ensures optimal natural light and energy flow according to Vastu principles, while offering a welcoming facade.

Large windows and balconies strategically placed along the north and east sides of the house for maximum natural light, ventilation, and aesthetic appeal. Each opening is designed in a style that complements the Art Deco farmhouse theme.

A spacious outdoor patio adjoining the living area, serving as a transitional space between the indoor and the large garden. The design incorporates Art Deco details with an emphasis on open-air comfort.

rooms.description: A well-appointed guest bedroom on the upper level, designed with modern Art Deco finishes and Vastu-compliant layout for balanced energy.
An adjoining bathroom to the second guest room, incorporating functional design with a nod to Art Deco aesthetics through fixtures and geometric patterns.
A dedicated service space for household staff or utilities. Designed to maintain a balance between practicality and the overall farmhouse aesthetic, with Vastu principles guiding placement.

openings.description: A centrally located staircase designed in an Art Deco style, ensuring safe and efficient movement between levels. The staircase is compliant with local building norms for safety.
Skylights and additional balcony spaces on the upper level to allow natural light, ventilation, and a view of the garden. The openings are designed following Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.

rooms.description: A dedicated area for relaxation and reading, featuring built-in bookshelves and a cozy ambiance. The design integrates Art Deco decor with modern comforts.
An extra room to accommodate storage or laundry facilities as required, designed in keeping with the farmhouse aesthetic and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A transitional space connecting the main levels. The split-level design is carefully planned to ensure smooth movement while adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles.
An expansive window that overlooks the garden, providing a serene view from the split level. It enhances natural light and energy flow according to Vastu.

rooms.description: A versatile rooftop space with a terrace design that offers panoramic views of the garden and surroundings, perfect for gatherings or relaxation. The area integrates Art Deco design elements with modern outdoor features.

openings.description: A safe and secure staircase leading to the rooftop terrace, designed following building safety norms and enhancing the overall farmhouse aesthetic.
A large skylight that floods the terrace with natural light during the day, in keeping with Vastu principles for energy and brightness.
